name: Outset Media® Cross Cribb Game
discription:
An exciting strategy game!



Played as a variation of cribbage and will appeal to both cribbage and non-cribbage players Build five high scoring cribbage hands while trying to sabotage your opponents’ hands Comes with rules for such variations as CrossCribb 20:20, CrossCribb Double Trouble and Cross Poker Includes 22" x 22" game board, a deck of cards, dice, pencil, instructions, and pad of score sheets
